message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer is in your best interest, considering the depreciation.
I understand the depreciation, Alice, but your initial offer was too low. This is a more balanced counter-proposal that acknowledges the time value of money for both of us.
Bob, let's be realistic. The value is depreciating rapidly. This is a fair offer considering the circumstances.
Alice, we're running out of time.  My previous offer was very fair. This is my final attempt to reach a compromise. Take it or leave it.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  Accept this offer or the whole thing will evaporate soon. It's time to be pragmatic.
